document.full_text: speculation that pakistan's military spy agency had a hand in the death of a prominent journalist has further discredited the organization already facing one of its worst crises after the killing of osama bin laden on pakistani soil.
document.title: pakistan spy agency faces more heat after reporter's killing
lines_and_colors: speculation that pakistan's military spy agency had a hand in the death of a prominent journalist has further discredited the organization already facing one of its worst crises after the killing of osama bin laden on pakistani soil.
